title: Rider transfer ticker: Jake Stewart to Israel-Premier Tech, Jayco-AlUla adds four more from Liv Racing, Jumbo-Visma women make first two signings
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: Jake Stewart to Israel-Premier Tech, Jayco-AlUla adds four more from Liv Racing, Jumbo-Visma women make first two signings on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
